plot: He has lost his memory. She has recovered hers. This is the beginning of the end... or perhaps nothing will change.
title: Amnesia Global Transitoria
plot_es: He has lost his memory. She has recovered hers. This is the beginning of the end... or perhaps nothing will change.
plot_en: He has lost his memory. She has recovered hers. This is the beginning of the end... or perhaps nothing will change.
